EmailTemplate.description: Auto-notification sent to CentralOps when a waiting list person has new availability
EmailTemplate.name: Waiting list person to be reassigned
EmailTemplate.subject: Waiting list applicant in {!Contact.School_s_cluster__c} - new availability confirmed by Schools Coordinator
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
Re a waiting list applicant in {!Contact.School_s_cluster__c}:
Please look at {!Contact.Name}'s record. They are on a waiting list but the Schools Coordinator has obtained new availability information from them. Please urgently reallocate them based on this information. Click on this link to see the record: {!Contact.Link}
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever a Schools Coordinator obtains new availability information
